original_text: “If she marries a husband, while under her vows or any thoughtless utterance of her lips by which she has bound herself,
korean_text: 또 혹시 남편을 맞을 때에 서원이나 결심한 서약을 경솔하게 그의 입술로 말하였으면

sentences.original_text: or any thoughtless utterance of her lips
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그녀의 입술에서 나온 경솔한 말이라도,

sentences.original_text: by which she has bound herself,
